metadata.title: Japanese Pacific EEZ Sardine Biomass & Egg Production

creators.name: National Research Institute of Fisheries Science

metadata.description:
Data includes spawning stock abundance (SSB), egg production, recruitment and productive success of the Japanese sardine along the Pacific coast of Japan and Oyashio index.   

[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To index stock abundance.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Annually
